attributes.action: stop all expenses and force MP's to live on their salaries alone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current expose about expenses, this petition asks the Prime Minister to stop all expenses and to make MP's live on their salaries like the voting public have to do day by day.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
